item.title: Monte Carlo Geometry Processing
item.description: 資料 Sawhney, R., & Crane, K. (2020). Monte Carlo Geometry Processing: A Grid-Free Approach to PDE-Based Methods on Volumetric Domains. ACM Trans. Graph., 39(4).
